attributes.action: Hillsborough.. haven't these families suffered enough 24 years is to long. Start the inquests NOW.
attributes.additional_details: Give full justice to the families of the Hillsborough 96. Some families have gone to their graves never seeing the truth on the death certificates of their loved ones some have refused to collect them as accidental death is not the cause of their loved ones being taken from them. The TRUTH is now out there, Lets not make these people wait any longer time is passing by and some are terminally ill. Give them peace to take with them when they reunite with their loved ones up in heaven.Please start the inquests now.Any more hold up is another insult towards the 96 and their families.
